R

randomBetweenInterval(Random, long, long) - Static method in class com.ssdd.util.Utils
generates a random number between a given interval.
ready() - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.client.CriticalSectionClient
indicates the services that the current process is ready and waits until all processes are ready
ready() - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.service.CriticalSectionService
waits untill all processes are ready
ready() - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.service.CriticalSectionServiceProxy
See CriticalSectionService.ready()
release() - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.client.CriticalSectionClient
releases the critical section with the Ricart and Argawala algorithm.
release(String) - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.service.CriticalSectionService
used by suscribed processes to to release the critical section
release(String) - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.service.CriticalSectionServiceProxy
See CriticalSectionService.release(String)
releaseNotifier - Variable in class com.ssdd.cs.bean.CritialSectionProcessState
object to notify that critical section has been released in the queued processes by the algorithm of Ricart and Argawala
request(String, String, long) - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.service.CriticalSectionService
processes the requests to the critical section access, send by other processes
request(String, String, long) - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.service.CriticalSectionServiceProxy
See CriticalSectionService.request(String, String, long)
restart(int) - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.service.CriticalSectionService
restarts the service cleaning all process's state structures and receives the number of processes that will try to access the critical section.
restart(int) - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.service.CriticalSectionServiceProxy
See CriticalSectionService.restart(int)
restartCs(int, String[]) - Static method in class com.ssdd.main.MainSupervisor
restarts the critical section service in each server
route(String) - Method in class com.ssdd.cs.client.CriticalSectionRouter
given a process, provides its associated service.
router - Variable in class com.ssdd.cs.client.CriticalSectionClient
router to access other processes
router - Variable in class com.ssdd.cs.client.CriticalSectionRouter

run() - Method in class com.ssdd.simulation.SimulationProcess
Behaviour to be executed as a independient Thread.
